FuncDef: This command configures the SSH protocol version that will be supported by the SSH server.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the SSH version. Values-1 - Specifies that the SSH server will only accept connections from clients that support SSH protocol version 1
2 - Specifies that the SSH server will accept connections from clients supporting either SSH protocol version 2
1-2 - Specifies that the SSH server will accept connections from clients supporting either SSH protocol version 1, or SSH protocol version 2 or both.. ParamDefault: Default- 2
